tests_executed.description: POST /api/todos returns 201 status for valid data
Created todo is returned in response with all fields
Validation for missing 'text' field returns 400 error
Validation for empty 'text' field returns 400 error
Todo is actually stored and can be retrieved via GET
Multiple todos can be created successfully

success_criteria_met: POST /api/todos returns 201 status for valid data
Created todo is returned in response
Todo is actually stored (can be retrieved via GET)
